product_name: Shimano XT RD-M781 SGS 10-Speed Rear Derailleur
long_description: Featuring an optional direct mount for compatible bikes, the Shimano XT RD-M781 SGS 10-Speed Rear Derailleur delivers mountain-ready toughness, responsive shifting and a low-profile design. Updated from the XT RD M780, the M781 offers optional direct mounting on compatible frames for increased stiffness and a smooth ride. Shadow-type design features a lower-profile body and bracket with direct cable routing to help avoid obstacles. Wide link parallelogram design increases rigidity for excellent, responsive shifting performance; stronger return spring ensures fast, snappy shifts. Lightweight aluminum construction; coated link pivot bushings minimize friction for fast, responsive movement. Shimano XT RD-M781 SGS 10-Speed rear derailleur handles a minimum cassette cog size of 11T and maximum cassette cog size of 36T. Please note: derailleur is compatible with Shimano Dyna-Sys HG-X 10-speed mountain cassettes and chains (not included).
